item.description:
Venez passez un bon moment à discuter en français à Panera Bread (Dover). Choisissez un petit déjeuner, un snack, ou une bonne tasse de café pour accompagner notre discussion. Venez nous rejoindre !

Ana Iorga is your Event Hostess for this Saturday morning event, which repeats monthly on the first Saturday. Location may change in the future according to the preference of the hostess and members. Contact Pam if you have a suggestion!

>> As announced in Pam's recent email to the group, the 2013 annual dues is $20. This amount offers a discount on the $1/event fee if you attend twice per month and substantial savings if you attend more meetings this year (and we're talking about having 4 meetings per month, so it's not only convenient but a great deal!). Cash is preferred, but you also may pay by check [made out to Pam Angulo] at your next event. Merci !<<
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Ana and a red and white Meetup sign on the table, hopefully in the nook to the left of the entrance--seat availability may vary, of course, but that will be our first choice!

group.name: Seacoast NH French Language Meetup Group

item.name: Matinée francophone au café - samedi
